### Application Description

This application calculates how many days between different Dates.

#### Tab Output1

Users choose **Start Date** and **End Date**,then consider weather include these days in the calculation.

#### Tab Output2

Users input a Date and decide regard this Date as **Start Date** or **End Date**.After inputing a diff, you will get the Date you want.
